segments.text: Good afternoon , sir.What Can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I can't find my key now . I think I have lost it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Have you left it in your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I took it with me when I went out this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case , you have to pay for it . Please fill out the form first .
segments.speaker: S1
